title: How to Prevent Yourself from Getting Banned from Online Games

steps.headline: Read the community rules for the game you are playing.
steps.description: If they forbid swearing then do not swear. Learn and know these rules so you can keep out of trouble.

steps.headline: Many games implement a system in which you can get reported by other players.
steps.description: Understand the players, if they disagree with what you are doing and it happens to be against the game's rules, you could have a ban on the way.

steps.headline: Ignore insults and do not lash out.
steps.description: If you do, you risk giving the other player grounds to ban you. Instead, report them if they are being really offensive.

steps.headline: Respect other players.
steps.description: The word n00b is considered offensive by some people (which actually means "newbie," so it would be better to say that instead of noob)

steps.headline: Avoid making sexual or perverted jokes in public chats, as these can get you banned.
Do not use bots.
steps.description: You can also get banned for using bots, automated programs that play the game for you. If you do not cheat by using bots, you will not get banned because of them. Most online games have ways to check for or fight back against bots now anyway.

steps.headline: Do not make racist or sexist remarks.
steps.description: These are considered offensive in most online communities.

steps.headline: Follow the rules of the game.
steps.description: This seems simple but is often overlooked.

steps.headline: Do not use your account to advertise a product or service in the game.
steps.description: This is considered spamming and can get you banned. You will get banned even faster if you post links involving sexual content.

text: Read the community rules for the game you are playing. If they forbid swearing then do not swear. Learn and know these rules so you can keep out of trouble. Many games implement a system in which you can get reported by other players. Understand the players, if they disagree with what you are doing and it happens to be against the game's rules, you could have a ban on the way. Ignore insults and do not lash out. If you do, you risk giving the other player grounds to ban you. Instead, report them if they are being really offensive. Respect other players. The word n00b is considered offensive by some people (which actually means "newbie," so it would be better to say that instead of noob) Avoid making sexual or perverted jokes in public chats, as these can get you banned.  Do not use bots. You can also get banned for using bots, automated programs that play the game for you. If you do not cheat by using bots, you will not get banned because of them. Most online games have ways to check for or fight back against bots now anyway. Do not make racist or sexist remarks. These are considered offensive in most online communities. Follow the rules of the game. This seems simple but is often overlooked. Do not use your account to advertise a product or service in the game. This is considered spamming and can get you banned. You will get banned even faster if you post links involving sexual content.
